original_text: So he said to his gardener, “Look, for three years, I have come to look for fruit on this tree. But I have never found any. So cut the tree down! I do not think that it should be here. It is wasting the ground.”
korean_text: 포도원지기에게 이르되 내가 삼 년을 와서 이 무화과나무에서 열매를 구하되 얻지 못하니 찍어버리라 어찌 땅만 버리게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: So he said to his gardener
I have come to look for fruit on this tree
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 나무에서 열매를 찾으러 왔다

sentences.original_text: But I have never found any
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 한 번도 찾지 못했다

sentences.original_text: I do not think that it should be here
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것이 여기에 있어서는 안 된다고 생각하지 않는다
